languages.text: "Будет исполнено. Транспорты класса "Иерихон" не приспособлены для битвы. Мастер артиллерии поклялся, что с такой позиции сможет поразить реактор судна одним выстрелом главного калибра, вызвав цепную реакцию и полное уничтожение корабля".

"It will be done. 'Jericho' class transports were never meant for battle. The Master of Artillery swears he can destroy the vessel's reactor with a single shot from the main battery, triggering a chain reaction that will completely obliterate the vessel."
languages.original_text: "Будет исполнено. Транспорты класса "Иерихон" не приспособлены для битвы. Мастер артиллерии поклялся, что с такой позиции сможет поразить реактор судна одним выстрелом главного калибра, вызвав цепную реакцию и полное уничтожение корабля".

traits.locale_text: "It will be done. 'Jericho' class transports were never meant for battle. The Master of Artillery swears he can destroy the vessel's reactor with a single shot from the main calibre, triggering a chain reaction that will completely obliterate the vessel."

"It will be done. 'Jericho' class transports were never meant for battle. The Master of Artillery swears he can destroy the vessel's reactor with a single shot from the main calibre, triggering a chain reaction that will completely obliterate the vessel."

"It will be done. 'Jericho' class transports were never meant for battle. The Master of Artillery swears he can destroy the vessel's reactor with a single shot from the main battery, triggering a chain reaction that will completely obliterate the vessel."

languages.text: « Il en sera fait selon vos désirs. Les transporteurs de classe "Jericho" n'ont pas été conçus pour le combat. Le maître de l'artillerie assure pouvoir détruire le vaisseau d'un seul tir de la batterie principale : il suffit de viser le réacteur pour déclencher une réaction en chaîne qui le réduira en poussière. »
languages.original_text: "It will be done. 'Jericho' class transports were never meant for battle. The Master of Artillery swears he can destroy the vessel's reactor with a single shot from the main battery, triggering a chain reaction that will completely obliterate the vessel."

traits.locale_text: « Il en sera fait selon vos désirs. Les transporteurs de classe "Jericho" n'ont pas été conçus pour le combat. Le maître de l'artillerie assure pouvoir détruire le vaisseau d'un seul tir de la batterie principale : il suffit de viser le réacteur pour déclencher une réaction en chaîne qui le réduira en poussière. »

languages.text: “遵命。‘耶利哥’级运输船并不是用来战斗的。炮组长说只要主炮台一发炮弹，就可以摧毁那艘飞船的反应堆，引发连锁反应，彻底破坏那艘飞船。”
languages.original_text: "It will be done. 'Jericho' class transports were never meant for battle. The Master of Artillery swears he can destroy the vessel's reactor with a single shot from the main battery, triggering a chain reaction that will completely obliterate the vessel."

traits.locale_text: “遵命。‘耶利哥’级运输船并不是用来战斗的。炮组长说只要主炮台一发炮弹，就可以摧毁那艘飞船的反应堆，引发连锁反应，彻底破坏那艘飞船。”

languages.text: "Es wird geschehen. Transporter der Jericho-Klasse waren nie für den Kampf gedacht. Der Meister der Artillerie schwört, dass er den Reaktor des Schiffs durch einen einzigen Schuss aus der Hauptbatterie zerstören kann, wodurch eine Kettenreaktion ausgelöst wird, die das Schiff vollkommen auslöscht."
languages.original_text: "It will be done. 'Jericho' class transports were never meant for battle. The Master of Artillery swears he can destroy the vessel's reactor with a single shot from the main battery, triggering a chain reaction that will completely obliterate the vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Es wird geschehen. Transporter der Jericho-Klasse waren nie für den Kampf gedacht. Der Meister der Artillerie schwört, dass er den Reaktor des Schiffs durch einen einzigen Schuss aus der Hauptbatterie zerstören kann, wodurch eine Kettenreaktion ausgelöst wird, die das Schiff vollkommen auslöscht."

languages.text: «Así se hará. Los transportes de clase "Jericho" no están hechos para la batalla. El maestro de artillería afirma que puede destruir el reactor de la nave con un solo disparo desde la batería principal, lo que provocará una reacción en cadena que acabará destruyendo la nave por completo».
languages.original_text: "It will be done. 'Jericho' class transports were never meant for battle. The Master of Artillery swears he can destroy the vessel's reactor with a single shot from the main battery, triggering a chain reaction that will completely obliterate the vessel."

traits.locale_text: «Así se hará. Los transportes de clase "Jericho" no están hechos para la batalla. El maestro de artillería afirma que puede destruir el reactor de la nave con un solo disparo desde la batería principal, lo que provocará una reacción en cadena que acabará destruyendo la nave por completo».

languages.text: 「あの船は終わりです。『ジェリコ』級の輸送船は間違っても戦闘用ではありません。砲撃長は主砲から一発で船のリアクターを破壊し、そこから連鎖反応を起こして船を全て消し飛ばせると宣言しています」
languages.original_text: "It will be done. 'Jericho' class transports were never meant for battle. The Master of Artillery swears he can destroy the vessel's reactor with a single shot from the main battery, triggering a chain reaction that will completely obliterate the vessel."

traits.locale_text: 「あの船は終わりです。『ジェリコ』級の輸送船は間違っても戦闘用ではありません。砲撃長は主砲から一発で船のリアクターを破壊し、そこから連鎖反応を起こして船を全て消し飛ばせると宣言しています」

languages.text: "Başüstüne. 'Jeriko' sınıfı nakil gemileri, çatışma için yapılmamışlardır. Topçu Üstadı, ana bataryanın tek bir atışıyla geminin reaktörünü yok edebileceğine ve zincirleme bir reaksiyon tetikleyerek gemiyi tamamen ortadan kaldırabileceğine yemin ediyor."
languages.original_text: "It will be done. 'Jericho' class transports were never meant for battle. The Master of Artillery swears he can destroy the vessel's reactor with a single shot from the main battery, triggering a chain reaction that will completely obliterate the vessel."
